'''Chivalric Training''' is the first act in [[Noelle]]'s [[Hangout Event]]. In order to unlock this quest line, the player needs 2 [[Story Key]]s, must have completed [[Prologue]] Act III: [[Song of the Dragon and Freedom]], and reached [[Adventure Rank]] 26.

==Storyline Summaries==
'''"Honorary Knight!"''' - One of your junior Knights of Favonius would like to receive your guidance...
#'''All of Life is Training''' - Head to Mondstadt with Noelle.
##'''Guest From Afar''' - Noelle decides to receive the merchant named Alois with cordial hospitality.
###'''After Hospitality Comes...''' - Escort Alois from Mondstadt.
###*'''Ending: A Cold Reception''' - Not every attempt at passionate hospitality is given perfect closure.
##*'''Ending: "Goodbye, Miss Maid!"''' - Each time she heads out, she brings her gentle intent along.
#'''Training Ground''' - Noelle would like to display her basic skills to you at the training ground.
##'''For More Experience''' - Noelle heads out to Mondstadt's outskirts to get some more live combat experience...
##*'''Ending: A Defender's Will Is Their Strength''' - This strength exists to defend others.
##'''For Greater Strength''' - Noelle decides to begin mining in order to become stronger...
##*'''Ending: A Maid Above Ground''' - ...Just a bunch of rocks.
#'''A Breather''' - You go to rest at Good Hunter with Noelle.
##'''It's the Heart That Matters''' - After some discussion, you decide to use some Grilled Fish to try to touch Quinn's heart...
###'''The Almighty Maid and Her Impossible Task''' - Look for Noelle in the library.
###*'''Ending: A Conundrum Called Love''' - It may take some time yet to discover the answer to "love"...
##'''Sincerest of Gifts''' - After some consideration, you decide to go to With Wind Comes Glory to pick a gift...
###'''Promised Place''' - The troubles of others have been seen to. Time to enjoy a moment to yourselves.
###*'''Ending: Whisper of the Paper Rose''' - "The meaning of the rose only exists in our hearts..."
